name: jao
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wo(w0, w2), w1)))

stmt.origin: ex(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w1), wi(wo(w0, w2), w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wo(w0, w2), w1)))
-| wi(wa(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w1)), wi(wo(w0, w2), w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wo(w0, w2), w1)))
-| wi(wa(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w1)), wi(wo(w0, w2), w1))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w1)), wi(wo(w0, w2), w1))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wo(w0, w2), w1)))

comment: Disjunction of antecedents. Compare Theorem *3.44 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 113. (Contributed by NM, 5-Apr-1994.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 4-Apr-2013.)
